          <title>
            <string language="en">Soil acidity and fertilisers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bodensäure und -düngemittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acidité et engrais de sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acidity e fertilizantes do solo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acidità e fertilizzanti del terreno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδαφολογικά οξύτητα και λιπάσματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acidez y fertilizantes del suelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This graph shows that using fertiliser continuously decreases the acidity of the soil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkalinity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fertiliser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal indicator</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm stellt dar, daß dem das Verwenden
des Düngemittels ununterbrochen die Säure des Bodens verringert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique montre que cela l'utilisation de 
l'engrais diminue sans interruption l'acidité du sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico mostra que isso usar o fertilizante 
diminui continuamente o acidity do solo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico mostra che quello usando il 
fertilizzante continuamente fa diminuire l'acidità del terreno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση δείχνει ότι η χρησιμοποίηση
του λιπάσματος μειώνει συνεχώς την οξύτητα του χώματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico muestra que eso usar el 
fertilizante continuamente disminuye la acidez del suelo.</string>
          </description>
